title: React Counter App
content: Boca Code Week 4: A React project practicing useState() hook  for smooth incrementing, decrementing, and resetting of a displayed number.

title: Kardashev Scale
content: Boca Code Week 4: Webpage explaining civilization advancement through the Kardashev Scale, built with HTML, Vanilla JavaScript, and CSS for an immersive experience.

title: Much-To Do
content: Boca Code Week 5: Real-time to-do app powered by React and Firebase, enabling seamless task management across devices with automatic data synchronization.

title: Timber Login
content: Boca Code Week 5: React and React Bootstrap-based login page with an intuitive interface, providing secure authentication and sign-up functionalities.

title: Water Tracker App
content: Boca Code Week 8: React Native, Expo, and JS mobile app to track daily water intake, set goals, and monitor progress for a healthier lifestyle.
